attributes.action: David Cameron should get on with the job and duty of triggering Article 50.
attributes.additional_details: While David Cameron sits on his hands and does nothing, the country is in increasing crisis. It is unacceptable that he will not address this issue. It is his duty to end the uncertainty around this which is destabling the country after a democratic referendum voted to leave. He has a duty to do this urgently whether he is going to give up the Premiership or not. We need to end all this speculation and infighting.
attributes.background: While David Cameron sits on his hands and does nothing, the country is in increasing crisis. It is unacceptable that he will not address this issue. He has a duty to the country to address this issue urgently.
